Sentencas: For enhancing the power density of a solid oxide fuel cell, mesoscale-structure control of electrode-electrolyte interfaces in an anode-supported cell is proposed.
Titulo: A corrugated mesoscale structure on electrode-electrolyte interface for enhancing cell performance in anode-supported SOFC

Sentencas: We define 'mesoscale' as a size range of the order of 10-100 mu m which is larger than the 'microscale' of electrode particles but smaller than the 'macroscale' of cell geometries.
Titulo: A corrugated mesoscale structure on electrode-electrolyte interface for enhancing cell performance in anode-supported SOFC

Sentencas: Mesoscale-structure control enlarges the electrode-electrolyte interface, and this enlargement extends an active electrochemical reaction zone where a charge-transfer reaction occurs actively near the interface.
Titulo: A corrugated mesoscale structure on electrode-electrolyte interface for enhancing cell performance in anode-supported SOFC

Sentencas: A corrugated mesoscale electrolyte was adopted which enlarged the interface structures of both anode and cathode sides.
Titulo: A corrugated mesoscale structure on electrode-electrolyte interface for enhancing cell performance in anode-supported SOFC

Sentencas: We performed a 2-D numerical simulation, and discussed the effects of such structure not only on the overall performance but also on the detailed distributions of electric potentials, gas concentrations and local electrochemical reaction rate.
Titulo: A corrugated mesoscale structure on electrode-electrolyte interface for enhancing cell performance in anode-supported SOFC

Sentencas: As a result, it was observed that the corrugated mesoscale structure reduced both activation overpotential and ohmic loss by ion transport, and hence enhanced the power generation performance.
Titulo: A corrugated mesoscale structure on electrode-electrolyte interface for enhancing cell performance in anode-supported SOFC

Sentencas: When the interface area enlargement factor was 1.73, an enhancement of a power density having a maximum value of 59% was achieved with the mesoscale-corrugated cell rather than with the flat cell.
Titulo: A corrugated mesoscale structure on electrode-electrolyte interface for enhancing cell performance in anode-supported SOFC
